template.name: Template Cisco Call Manager Syslog
template.description: Template para monitoramento de itens atrav√©s de evento gerados por syslog para Call Manager.

trigger.expression: {Template Cisco Call Manager Syslog:log[/var/log/syslog-ng/{$CLUSTER1}.log,%UC_DRF,,,,,].str("%UC_DRF-3-DRF")}=1
trigger.name: Falha de backup/restaura√ß√£o no Cluster de Call Manager {$CLUSTER1}
trigger.description:
Falha de backup/restaura√ß√£o no Cluster de Call Manager {$CLUSTER1}.
Ap√≥s an√°lise,favor encerrar manualmente o evento no Zabbix.

trigger.expression: {Template Cisco Call Manager Syslog:log[/var/log/syslog-ng/{$CLUSTER2}.log,%UC_DRF,,,,,].str("%UC_DRF-3-DRF")}=1
trigger.name: Falha de backup/restaura√ß√£o no Cluster de Call Manager {$CLUSTER2}
trigger.description:
Falha de backup/restaura√ß√£o no Cluster de Call Manager {$CLUSTER2}.
Ap√≥s an√°lise,favor encerrar manualmente o evento no Zabbix.

trigger.expression: {Template Cisco Call Manager Syslog:log[/var/log/syslog-ng/{$CLUSTER1}.log,,,,,,].str("%UC_CALLMANAGER-3-DbInfo")}=1
trigger.recovery_expression: {Template Cisco Call Manager Syslog:log[/var/log/syslog-ng/{$CLUSTER1}.log,,,,,,].str("Replicate_State")}=1 and {Template Cisco Call Manager Syslog:log[/var/log/syslog-ng/{$CLUSTER1}.log,,,,,,].str("value of 2")}=1
trigger.name: Falha de database no Cluster de Call Manager {$CLUSTER1}
trigger.description:
Falha de database no Cluster de Call Manager {$CLUSTER1}
Ap√≥s an√°lise, favor encerrar manualmente o evento no Zabbix.

trigger.expression: {Template Cisco Call Manager Syslog:log[/var/log/syslog-ng/{$CLUSTER2}.log,,,,,,].str(%UC_CALLMANAGER-3-DbInfo)}=1
trigger.recovery_expression: {Template Cisco Call Manager Syslog:log[/var/log/syslog-ng/{$CLUSTER2}.log,,,,,,].str(Replicate_State)}=1 and {Template Cisco Call Manager Syslog:log[/var/log/syslog-ng/{$CLUSTER2}.log,,,,,,].str(value of 2)}=1
trigger.name: Falha de database no Cluster de Call Manager {$CLUSTER2}
trigger.description: Falha de database no Cluster de Call Manager {$CLUSTER2}

trigger.expression: {Template Cisco Call Manager Syslog:log[/var/log/syslog-ng/{$CLUSTER1}.log,"UC_CDRREP-3-CDR",,,,,].str(%UC_CDRREP-3-CDR)}=1
trigger.name: Falha de entrega de bilhete CDR no Cluster de Call Manager {$CLUSTER1}
trigger.description:
Falha de entrega de bilhete CDR no Cluster de Call Manager {$CLUSTER1}
Verificar na URL demais informa√ß√£o.

trigger.expression: {Template Cisco Call Manager Syslog:log[/var/log/syslog-ng/{$CLUSTER2}.log,"UC_CDRREP-3-CDR",,,,,].str(%UC_CDRREP-3-CDR)}=1
trigger.name: Falha de entrega de bilhete CDR no Cluster de Call Manager {$CLUSTER2}
trigger.description:
Falha de entrega de bilhete CDR no Cluster de Call Manager {$CLUSTER2}
Ap√≥s an√°lise,favor encerrar manualmente o evento no Zabbix.

trigger.description: Verificar a conectividade entre o Cluster de Call Manager {$CLUSTER1} e o SIP Trunk {$SIPTRUNK101}.
